Permission to access SMS

The permission gives the application the possibility to:

  • Receive SMS and process them in the background
  • Receive MMS and WAP messages
  • Read received and sent SMS
  • Send SMS

A practical example

  • Demonstration of abuse of a given permission, specifically read SMS messages
  • You must have Internet access and allow the permission

Permission to access contacts

The permission gives the application the possibility to:

  • Read the users contacts data
  • Write the users contacts data
  • Access to the list of accounts in the Accounts Service

A practical example

  • Demonstration of abuse of a given permission, specifically read phone contacts
  • You must have Internet access and allow the permission
